patterns: Hi
Hey

Good evening

What's up?

responses: Hey :-)
Hello, thanks for visiting
Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: Bye

Goodbye
Catch you later
Take care
Farewell
I'm leaving
Later
See ya
I'm out
responses: See you later, thanks for visiting
Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.

patterns: Thanks
Thank you
Much appreciated
I'm grateful
Thanks a lot!
Cheers
That's helpful
responses: Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

Academics

Athletics

patterns: How do I access Canvas?
KU Canvas
Where can I check my assignments on Canvas?
How do I submit my assignment?
Where can I see my grades?

What is Canvas?
responses: Access KU Canvas here: KU Canvas. Ensure your notifications are set up correctly for class updates.

patterns: How do I access my KU email?
Where can I check my university email?
What is the link to KU email?
How to access KU Office 365?
responses: You can check your KU email here: KU Email.

patterns: How do I access My KU?
What is My KU?
How do I enroll in classes?
Where can I check my pay stubs?
Where do I find my student information?
What services are available on My KU?
How can I check my KU financial aid?
responses: You can access My KU for enrollments, payments, and more here: My KU.

patterns: Where do I enroll in courses?
How do I make a payment for tuition?
What is the Enroll and Pay link?
Where can I check my course enrollment?
responses: You can enroll in classes and make payments here: KU Enroll & Pay.

HR Pay

responses: You can clock in and track your work hours here: HR Pay.

responses: You can find job listings and apply here: KU Jobs.

patterns: How do I contact KU IT support?

responses: You can find IT support and resources here: KU IT Support.

responses: International students can find support and resources here: KU ISS (International Student Services).

patterns: Where can I check my class schedule?
